WorkItem.ClosedComment: The crashing was fixed by an earlier release - cant remember which.As for the Glyph of Lifetap and Conflag issues - they were already reported seperately.
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
Since the realease 2.2.14, Rawr crash when someone is wearing Bonus 4p T8R25. Probably due to Immolation. And it doesn't repair on the 2.2.15
 
Another problem : Sometime The Glyph of lifetap doesn't work correctly. (no more add damage).
 
Edit : Glyph of Conflagrate decreases DPS...Illogical Oo
 
Best regards.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Crash on specific group of settings

Comments.Message: i have the exactly the same problems

Since, I test a lot of things and i think that 4p T8 + immolation + glyph of conflag is the source of problem. When i activate immolation with 4p and glyph it crashs but when i desactivate the glyph and then i activate immolation it works normally !

Finally, I don't care about this bugs because I have 2p t9, but the bug of the glyph of conflag which decreases DPS is very boring
